abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Washington Capitals, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Antti Ranta made 32 saves playing in place of Henrik Lundqvist, the Rangers’ No. 1 goaltender, who sat out the game because of neck spasms.

headline.print_headline: Despite Lundqvist’s Absence, Rangers Squeeze by Capitals
headline.main: Despite Lundqvist’s Absence, Rangers Squeeze by Capitals
